abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Jan Piercy at the
            meeting of December 21, 2000 concerning the Interim Poverty
            Reduction Strategy Paper, the Joint Staff Assessment and
            HIPC Decision Point, the Country Assistance Strategy, and
            the Fiscal Restructuring and Deregulation Program for Malawi.
